p: The mean number of daily captures by traps was used to compare all the four areas. Despite higher captures (0.38 adults + nymphs/trap/day) in Area 1, there were no significant differences among the four areas by one-way ANOVA during the period from April to late Juneâ€“early July (adults + nymphs: F (3, 20) = 2.199, p = 0.120).
